direct_enhancements.reason: Both methods involve calculations based on the size of the unknownAttributes list.
Both methods interact with the unknownAttributes list, though one checks for presence and the other returns the count.
Both methods retrieve information from the unknownAttributes list, but one returns a count and the other a specific attribute.
Both methods manipulate the unknownAttributes list to produce a result, one for encoding and the other for counting.
Both methods modify the state of the unknownAttributes list, one by adding attributes and the other by counting them.

Checking for the presence of an attribute can be part of the setup before counting attributes.
